name: E20R Enhanced Members List Paid Memberships Pro
author: Thomas Sjolshagen <thomas@eighty20results.com>

sections.description: Extensible, sortable & bulk action capable members listing tool for Paid Memberships Pro, fully compatible with the existing filters and hooks for the PMPro Members List functionality. Will also export members to CSV.
sections.changelog:
5.9.1

  1. BUG FIX: Improved performance from Utilities library

5.8

  1. BUG FIX: Shipping plugin lacks standard utilities library

5.7.6

  1. BUG FIX: Possibly causing fatal error when running/activated

5.7.4

  1. BUG FIX: Remove .git info from release archive(s)

5.7.3

  1. BUG FIX: Extra data in .zip file

5.7.2

  1. BUG FIX: Didn't always include the discount code in exported data

5.7.1

  1. ENHANCEMENT: Pushing to WordPress.org repository
  2. BUG FIX: Prevent defining controller class more than once

3.0

  1. ENHANCEMENT: Pushing to WordPress.org repository
  2. BUG FIX: Prevent defining controller class more than once

2.7

  1. ENHANCEMENT: Change the names of the export .csv columns to match the expected column names for the Import Members from CSV plugin
  2. ENHANCEMENT: Added PHPDoc block for the Members_List::metadata_where() method
  3. ENHANCEMENT: WPCS formatting of Members_List() class
  4. ENHANCEMENT: Updated the Utilities sub-module
  5. BUG FIX: An update would sometimes get ignored (not saved)

2.6

  1. BUG FIX: Didn't include the values for any defined extra columns

2.5

  1. ENHANCEMENT: Let a developer change the 'expiration' ('last') column label with the 'e20r-members-list-enddate-col-name' filter
  2. ENHANCEMENT: Let a developer change the enddate value to match the (new?) 'last' column value (expiration date) with the 'e20r-members-list-enddate-col-result' filter

2.4

  1. BUG FIX: Allow user to reset search
  2. BUG FIX: Incorrect # of found records returned on search
  3. BUG FIX: Error looking up user ID for metadata
  4. BUG FIX: Clean URL (GET params from URL) if user has (just) searched

2.2

  1. BUG FIX: No longer supporting per line 'Cancel Membership' link

2.1

  1. BUG FIX: Clear search field when user clicks 'Update List' button
  2. BUG FIX: Show 'Invalid' if the startdate value is incorrect (not a current/real date value)
  3. ENHANCEMENT: Add build tools & one-click update support tools
  4. ENHANCEMENT: Single license text instance
  5. ENHANCEMENT: Load class if not previously defined
  6. ENHANCEMENT: WordPress Style updates
  7. ENHANCEMENT: Improved English grammar in error message

2.0

  1. Initial public release
sections.faq:
I found a bug in the plugin.

Please report your issue to us by using the Enhanced Members List Support Forum on The Eighty / 20 Website, and we'll normally respond within 1 business day.
